home.title: Welcome
home.subtitle: In partnership with
home.content: Collecting first-person accounts of living through the 2020 Covid19 pandemic in the UK. This is a place where you can explore and share your experiences anonymously.

experiences.title: Discover other people’s experiences of the pandemic
experiences.content: The Covid-19 virus has disrupted the way we live our lives. Read other people’s experiences of this time of change

share.title: Share your experience
share.content: Signing up is secure and how much you share is up to you, you can always withdraw at any time.

footer.content: If you need help with anything check out the Frequently Asked Questions.  If you have noticed something that does not look right, please contact the website admin.

global.tagline: Created by Hearing Voices Network England
global.about: Collecting first-person accounts of voices, from people who hear voices. This is a place where you can explore and share your experiences anonymously.

about.who: If you hear voices, HVN can help- we are committed to helping people who hear voices. We offer information, support and understanding to people who hear voices and those who support them.
about.what: The project is about collecting first person accounts of voice hearing. You can write, tag and submit your own experience, and you can read about other experiences. It's all anonymous.
about.why: Most research about hearing voices is done by people who don't hear voices, about people who do. We want to change this. We want people who hear voices to be able to use their own words to describe their experience, and to categorise it themselves. We want research that reflects the immense diversity in voice hearing. We also want to create research that voices hearers find useful, and can access. These are some of the ideas behind this project.

footer.title: Contribute to the project
footer.content: Sign up with an email and password to submit your own stories, this link will take you to the sign up page.

register.title: Hi there,
register.error: Unable to register your account. Please check the email address has not already been registered.
register.description:
Our Covid Voices is about capturing experiences we don’t hear that much about. We are particularly keen to hear from people who have had ongoing health issues or a disability long before Covid-19 happened. If you sign up you’ll be able to share up to 700 words of writing. You can write about whatever Covid-19 experiences matter most to you, for instance: loneliness; looking after someone else or yourself; how you engage with health or care services; how you buy food; and what you do to stay connected to people. We are not looking for the most dramatic, heart breaking or inspiring stuff. We want to know what it’s really like to live with ill health or disability or support someone who does during this period.

There is no obligation to give your name. You can submit a single experience, or multiple ones over a period of time.
register.step-description: Email, password, consent to sharing experiences.
register.step-1-description: Please type your email address below.
register.step-1-hint: Through your email, we will let you know about the publication process and any other important information about your account.
register.step-2-title: Create a password which you can remember.
register.step-2-description: Use a combination of lower case and upper case letters, numbers and symbols.
register.step-2-hint: The password you supply will be AES-256 bit encrypted (the same standard banks use)
register.step-3-description: By creating an account for this site you will be able to add your experiences. Remember, your experiences will be read by people you haven’t met, so don't share anything you wouldn’t want a stranger to know.  We will review each experience to make sure it doesn’t break any of our rules before it is published. You can remove your experiences at any time.  National Voices will use everyone's writing to raise awareness of how Covid-19 has impacted people with very different lives and will also take this insight to decision makers who are in charge of the health and care system.

confirmation.title: Account created
confirmation.description: Thank you for creating your account. You have two options now: you can submit your experience or go back to the home page to read other people’s submissions. If you are not sure what to write about, click on ‘Submit new experience’ to read our guidance.

cta.mobile: What would you like to do next?

footer.step-2-description: Consent to sharing your experience and information on the website.
footer.step-3-description: Click submit to finish creating your account.

footer.description: You will need to fill in your email so that we can make sure it’s you.

footer.description: Make sure to use a secure password and keep it safe.

dashboard.about:
National Voices has created Our Covid Voices to make it as easy as possible to share with the world what life is like for you right now.

National Voices will use the insight you will generate to influence national and local decision-makers. This will make it easier for them to develop policies and services that have a positive and tangible impact on people’s lives. The experiences shared on this website will help them get a clearer picture of what is happening now, and help us at National Voices make a better case for what needs to happen once this crisis ends.

Things will be different than they are now. We want to make sure that they are also better.
dashboard.description: Write now, or read about other’s experiences
